about_the_game:
WELCOME TO THE MAGICAL WORLD OF DOODLE TAXI


Do you miss good old days? No loot boxes, no micro transactions, no season passes? Maybe early 2000s open world games? I got your back!

Get ready for a Zen-like experience
Doodle Taxi's main thing is being a chill taxi driving simulator game. Enjoy this beautiful world as you cruise around and color it in while unraveling the story! Whether you want to drive around like a maniac or just chill out and listen to the bumping soundtrack, this is a great pick up and play driving game!


A GOOFY STORY


What's the worst thing that could happen to a modern day Taxi Driver? Not getting paid? Get mugged? No. A cabbie can get cursed by a witch and lose his sight. What if that witch is unable to control her powers in this world? What happens then?

WHAT THE CAR!?


This is a car game obviously. And we should have cars, more than one. Unlockable, locked behind some in-game currency. But don't worry, you can earn all these without spending real money. This is a game by a gamer who misses old days for the gamers who are sick of those modern tricks to squeeze more and more money from player.

STORY WISE, WHAT'S GOING ON?


You can play forever, there is a high replayability. Story part? Eh, this one is pretty straight forward. You can easily understand and enjoy core gameplay even more. It's not a Shakespeare, but this witch is quite the poet!

A BANGER SOUNDTRACK

When I say banger soundtrack, be sure that I'm telling truth. I'm so glad that so many talented indie musicians donated their awesome songs into this one, including;
Abstraction / Cat Temper / Obsidian Contraption / Colourful Energy / Dragon-Orb / Vercin Featherix / No Lake / Nelson & Bernstein / SparraLIMB

Wrapping up
So drive your car fast and careful, keep that 'being a good driver' meter at green, deliver customers on time. That's the name of the game. Thanks for reading so far and I wish you to enjoy my game.
